name: Shazaaam!
overview: When brands and companies want to connect in a meaningful way to their target markets, they hire Shazaaam! - an award winning agency known for delivering savvy, impactful, results-driven marketing communications solutions. Specialties include public relations, social media, online reputation management, marketing strategy, cause marketing programs, product launched and product sampling tours. Shazaaam!’s Emerging Business Practice (EBP) offers expertise in assisting family-owned and entrepreneurial enterprises through growth, launch, merger/acquisition and succession phases. Shazaaam! works with organizations of all sizes, from a wide range of industries and sectors including: Automotive (OEM & Aftermarket) – Business, Professional & Financial Services – Consumer Packaged Goods – Entertainment & Media (including film, music, sports and publishing) – Food and Beverage – Green Products and Initiatives – Healthcare & Beauty – Manufacturing – Nonprofit – Retail – Technology – Trade Organization. Shazaaam! handles all levels of campaigns from local to international. Visit www.shazaaam.com to learn more.
